org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.client

类 JdbcClientDetailsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.client.JdbcClientDetailsService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClientDetailsService, ClientRegistrationService

    public class JdbcClientDetailsService
extends Object
implements ClientDetailsService, ClientRegistrationService
    Basic, JDBC implementation of the client details service.

      • loadClientByClientId

        public ClientDetails loadClientByClientId(String clientId)
                                   throws InvalidClientException
        从接口复制的说明: ClientDetailsService
        Load a client by the client id. This method must not return null.
        指定者:
        loadClientByClientId 在接口中 ClientDetailsService
        参数:
        clientId - The client id.
        返回:
        The client details (never null).
        抛出:
        InvalidClientException
